verses.t: Let{G5293} every{G3956} soul{G5590} be subject unto{G5293} the higher{G5242} powers{G1849}. For{G1063} there is{G2076} no{G3756} power{G1849} but{G3361} of{G575} God{G2316}: the powers{G1849} that be{G5607} are{G1526} ordained{G5021} of{G5259} God{G3588}.

Whosoever{G498} therefore{G5620} resisteth{G498} the power{G3588}, resisteth{G436} the ordinance{G1296} of God{G3588}: and{G1161} they that resist{G436} shall receive{G2983} to themselves{G1438} damnation{G2917}.

For{G1063} rulers{G758} are{G1526} not{G3756} a terror{G5401} to{G2041} good{G18} works{G2041}, but{G235} to the evil{G2556}. Wilt thou{G2309} then{G1161} not{G3361} be afraid of{G5399} the power{G3588}? do{G4160} that which is good{G18}, and{G2532} thou shalt have{G2192} praise{G1868} of{G1537} the same{G846}:

For{G1063} he is{G2076} the minister{G1249} of God{G2316} to thee{G4671} for{G1519} good{G18}. But{G1161} if{G1437} thou do{G4160} that which is evil{G2556}, be afraid{G5399}; for{G1063} he beareth{G5409} not{G3756} the sword{G3588} in vain{G1500}: for{G1063} he is{G2076} the minister{G1249} of God{G2316}, a revenger{G1558} to{G1519} execute wrath{G3709} upon him that doeth{G4238} evil{G2556}.
Wherefore{G1352} ye must needs{G318} be subject{G5293}, not{G3756} only{G3440} for{G1223} wrath{G3588}, but{G235} also{G2532} for{G1223} conscience sake{G3588}.

For{G1063} for{G1223} this cause{G5124} pay ye{G5055} tribute{G5411} also{G2532}: for{G1063} they are{G1526} God's{G2316} ministers{G3011}, attending continually{G4342} upon{G1519} this{G5124} very thing{G846}.

Render{G591} therefore{G3767} to all{G3956} their dues{G3588}: tribute{G3588} to whom{G3588} tribute{G3588} is due; custom{G3588} to whom{G3588} custom{G3588}; fear{G3588} to whom{G3588} fear{G3588}; honour{G3588} to whom{G3588} honour{G3588}.
Owe{G3784} no man{G3367} any thing{G3367}, but{G3361} to love{G25} one another{G240}: for{G1063} he that loveth{G25} another{G2087} hath fulfilled{G4137} the law{G3551}.

For{G1063} this{G3588}, Thou shalt{G3431} not{G3756} commit adultery{G3431}, Thou shalt{G5407} not{G3756} kill{G5407}, Thou shalt{G2813} not{G3756} steal{G2813}, Thou shalt{G5576} not{G3756} bear false witness{G5576}, Thou shalt{G1937} not{G3756} covet{G1937}; and{G2532} if{G1487} there be any{G5100} other{G2087} commandment{G1785}, it is briefly comprehended{G346} in{G1722} this{G5129} saying{G3588}, namely{G1722}, Thou shalt love{G25} thy{G4675} neighbour{G4139} as{G5613} thyself{G1438}.
Love{G3588} worketh{G2038} no{G3756} ill{G2556} to his neighbour{G4139}: therefore{G3767} love{G3588} is the fulfilling{G4138} of the law{G3551}.

And{G2532} that{G5124}, knowing{G1492} the time{G3588}, that{G3754} now{G2235} it is high time{G5610} to awake{G1453} out of{G1537} sleep{G5258}: for{G1063} now{G3568} is our{G2257} salvation{G3588} nearer{G1452} than{G2228} when{G3753} we believed{G4100}.

The night{G3588} is far spent{G4298}, the day{G2250} is at hand{G1448}: let us{G659} therefore{G3767} cast off{G659} the works{G3588} of darkness{G3588}, and{G2532} let us put on{G1746} the armour{G3588} of light{G3588}.

Let us walk{G4043} honestly{G2156}, as{G5613} in{G1722} the day{G2250}; not{G3361} in rioting{G2970} and{G2532} drunkenness{G3178}, not{G3361} in chambering{G2845} and{G2532} wantonness{G766}, not{G3361} in strife{G2054} and{G2532} envying{G2205}.
But{G235} put ye on{G1746} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} make{G4160} not{G3361} provision{G4307} for the flesh{G3588}, to{G1519} fulfil the lusts{G1939} thereof.
